recipe.title: Miso-Turmeric Dressing
ingredients: 2 teaspoons finely grated peeled turmeric or 1/2 teaspoon ground turmeric
instructions: Whisk vinegar, mirin, vegetable oil, carrot, miso, ginger, turmeric, and sesame oil in a small bowl.
Do Ahead Veggies can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
Veggies can be made 5 days ahead. Cover and chill.
